mapper.insert: insert into orders(ordersid , ordercode , usersid , houseid , servsid , addtime , orderdate , sections , status , memo ) values(#{ordersid} , #{ordercode} , #{usersid} , #{houseid} , #{servsid} , #{addtime} , #{orderdate} , #{sections} , #{status} , #{memo} )
mapper.update: update orders set ordercode=#{ordercode} , usersid=#{usersid} , houseid=#{houseid} , servsid=#{servsid} , addtime=#{addtime} , orderdate=#{orderdate} , sections=#{sections} , status=#{status} , memo=#{memo} where ordersid=#{ordersid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , c.houseno , d.servsname from orders a , users b , house c , servs d where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.houseid = c.houseid and a.servsid = d.servsid order by ordersid desc

select a.* , b.username , c.houseno , d.servsname from orders a , users b , house c , servs d where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.houseid = c.houseid and a.servsid = d.servsid and ordersid=#{ordersid} order by ordersid desc

select a.* , b.username , c.houseno , d.servsname from orders a , users b , house c , servs d where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.houseid = c.houseid and a.servsid = d.servsid
